text: Danièle Hoffman-Rispal (22 June 1951 - 16 April 2020) was a French politician of Jewish descent. She was a member of the National Assembly of France from 2002 to 2012. She represented the city of Paris. Hoffman-Rispal was a member of the Socialist Party. Hoffman-Rispal died on 16 April 2020 in Paris at the age of 68.Danièle Hoffman-Rispal, ancienne députée et conseillère de Paris, est décédée ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Jewish French politicians Category:Jewish politicians Category:Politicians from Paris Category:Socialist Party (France) politicians
title: Danièle Hoffman-Rispal
